title: Regency Enterprises - Wikipedia
snippet: Therefore, Regency International Pictures became the holding company for all Milchan’s investments and was legally renamed as Regency Enterprises (doing business as Arnon Milchan Enterprises) and two new companies (both 100% held by Regency Enterprises) were established to produce movies: one to do business in the United States and legally named Regency Entertainment (USA), Inc., one to do business overseas and legally named Monarchy Enterprises S.á.r.l.

title: Regency Enterprises - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Regency Enterprises is an American film production company formed in 1991 as a joint venture between Arnon Milchan, Scriba & Deyle and Canal+ to finance 20 films in five years, with New Regency Productions acting as its production and sales arm.

title: New Regency Productions - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: New Regency produced 2013's 12 ... three nominations. As a joint venture with 20th Century Studios, the parent company Regency has an 80% stake in the company....

title: Regency Enterprises | Golden
snippet: Regency Enterprises is a los angeles-based entertainment company founded in 1982 by Arnon Milchan · Regency Enterprises is a privately held company involved in the video production industry and founded on January 1, 1982 by Arnon Milchan and Joseph Patrick Grace.
